fields.value: Haran Geppaku Futsu, Mistsplitter Reforged, The Black Sword, Skyward Blade, Lions Roar, Amenoma Kageuchi

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands>  ATK % | <goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus % | <circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Kamisato Art- Kyouka
**2)** Elemental Burst: Kamisato Art- Suiyuu
**3)** Normal Attack: Kamisato Art- Marobashi

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Normal attack talent does not need to be levelled up.
4 Echoes should only be considered when ping is consistently below 100, where the set effect will proc more consistently and is competitive with the other sets. 
4 Emblem should only be considered when running a burst-oriented Ayato that does 1 skill per Q rather than 2 skills per Q. 
4 Blizzard is a niche option which is best suited for Ayato in freeze team compositions, but it is recommended to prioritize blizzard pieces for cryo damage dealers in the same team over Ayato. ( read guide for details )
